question: 魚屋
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>fish</kanji> <kanji>shop</kanji> is a <vocabulary>fish shop</vocabulary>, a place from which you buy fish. Especially in Japan, very important.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The kun'yomi reading is used for the <ja>魚</ja> (so it's <ja>さかな</ja>) and the kun'yomi reading is used for <ja>屋</ja> (<ja>や</ja>). You'll have to use the reading of <ja>魚</ja> from the vocabulary from a couple levels ago to remember the reading of this one.
